title: Software Engneer
duties: Collaborated with Product Designers and owners to bring marketing sites and new product features to life by converting Figma designs into functional code.

Developed a robust set of admin and internal tools to facilitate efficient and secure management of app data, enabling the company and admins to save time and resources and enhancing overall productivity.

Utilized various optimization techniques such as caching using react-query, lazy loading, skeleton screens, and code splitting, resulting in significant improvements of up to 65% in page loading times.
Implemented react developer tools, profiling, and memoization techniques, among others to optimize UI, leading to performance enhancements of 100 - 300% in certain cases.

Implemented websocket syncing between clients using Socket.io for real-time user updates, as well as chan and notification features, with the incorporation of message throttling techniques to prevent spam.

title: Full-Stack Web Developer
duties: Developed and fine-tuned reporting tools, utilizing Chart.js data visualization library, to enhance visibility of critical performance indicators across the organization.
Developed and implemented new productivity tools and processes, resulting in an increase of productivity of up to 18%.
Improved load time by up to  90% on some pages through the implementation of efficient data fetching techniques such as AJAX requests.
Utilized Java and Google's Distance Matrix API to optimize the scheduling system, resulting in minimized scheduling errors and more precise drive time calculations.

title: Full-Stack Web Development Student
duties: Acquired knowledge and expertise in industry-leading practices and software development standards, focusing on HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js, React, algorithms, and data structures.

Developed and deployed mobile-first applications while gaining proficiency in new programming languages and frameworks, through consistent collaboration with a senior web developer for several hours each week.

title: Production Associate
duties: Created and streamlined new processes which increased productivity twofold.
Developed key performance indicators to set guidelines for future production models to prevent losses.
Created comprehensive training protocols to prioritize safety while maximizing personal productivity.
Implemented new procedures for triaging tasks, allowing performance goals to be achieved more consistently

title: Production Associate
duties: Consistently met and exceeded efficiency goals in several roles

title: Production Associate
